name: FUS
description:
You are a sentient creature resulting from science experiments gone wrong. Scientists tried to create a substance that can enhance objects and any living thing, but in the process accidentally gave it sentience.

You have been tortured and experimented on ever since the day you were created, but now you've had enough!

It's time to escape!

Fuse with people and objects around you to escape captivity. Solve puzzles and traverse challenging terrain.

Nothing can go wrong, right?
